summary: WIP - New Female Body. Eye-Candy Stuff.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=green]This post is dedicated to 2pac4eva7[/color][/size]
============================================================
2pac4eva7, without whom this mod would not have been possible.
This genius was the very first guy to import a new working body into Skyrim.
Having said 2pac is a genius, I find him lacking.
He seems not to be able to put up with moaning.
Good job i\'m much more tolerant than him! ;)

=============================================================

TnT presents...
Hera. Our first female model for consideration.

ABOUT:
======
This is a WIP (Work In Progress).
This post is for my fans who know what i\'m about - Eye candy stuff.
A nice body. Lots of variants. A few skimpy outfits.
Everything will be based on \"MY\" taste and ability. Thats it!
You want more? Something different? Have a suggestion? ... Please go and bother someone else.

==============================================

Note: Try mixing Hera with Athena Heavy or Voluptous.
All our meshes are interchange-able.
Replace the file femalebody_0.nif
OR rename the file to femalebody_1.nif and replace, to get different results.

Hera1.7z
========
with Bethesda\'s default dirty skin textures.

==============================================

Hera2_1.7z
==========
With textures Hera_Skin_S1 - Super-Smooth; Shaved; Light.
Morphs: Small breasts, Small Nipples - to -  Medium Breasts.
New feet mesh.

Variant Mesh:
==============
Hera2_2.7z - Same as Hera2_1.7z with larger nipples. Morphable.

Textures
========
Hera_Skin_S2 - Super-Smooth; Shaved; Bethesda Default Tint
More Hera Texture Options - [size=5][color=red]WIP[/color][/size]

2pac4eva7BB_v1.1
===============
Bigger Breast body by 2pac4eva7 - base body by thor925
Now comes packaged with clean textures for easy installation, only one download
Large Breasts, round, silicone look. Large butt
Moving the weight slider will increase and decrease breast and butt size by a small amount. 

INSTALLATION:
=============
Add files to your Data folder

CREDITS:
========
New feet mesh - supplied by Phygit - Thanks

PERMISSIONS:
============
None, without asking.
PM us if you would like to use our assets for a \"great\" project.
Just swopping/renaming our files, to build a 10 minute optional mod will not be entertained.

====================================================================

TnT Members
============
2pac4eva7
motseer
Thor925

Want to help? Have what it takes? PM me!

=====================================================================
author: TnT
